author: wrowe
msg: Reorder sequences to fix appearance problems, tab ordering problems,
and introduce the ValidatationError dialog to report errors.
Introduce INVALIDFIELD/INVALIDMESSAGE to the real_features.c source
to set those as the descriptions of the field and error message
Dialogs must trap for INVALIDFIELD, set the INVALIDDIALOG to their own
dialog name, and proceed to the ValidationError dialog (which will return
to whatever dialog is named by INVALIDDIALOG.

author: martin
msg: Now it fixes the url to Announcement.html

author: gstein
msg: Don't directly include ap_config_auto.h directly. It isn't available on
Windows platforms. Including ap_config.h will pick it up, or it will grab

author: wrowe
msg: Change the semantics - admin install alone runs as a service
